scripts.postinstall: yarn build-transpile && electron-builder install-app-deps && echo && echo 'yarn install: environment updated and prepared for build' && echo
scripts.unbinaries: rm -rf binaries && mkdir binaries && echo && echo 'unbinaries: binary artifacts deleted' && echo
scripts.uncache: rm -rf cache/electron/* && rm -rf cache/electron-builder/* && echo && echo 'uncache: removed electron end elctron-builder for windows caches' && echo
scripts.unbuild: rm -rf build && mkdir build && echo && echo 'unout: build artifacts deleted' && echo
scripts.undist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && echo && echo 'undist: distribution artifacts deleted' && echo
scripts.unerror: rm -rf yarn-error.log && echo && echo 'unerror: yarn error log deleted' && echo
scripts.unelectron: rm -rf public/electron.js && rm -rf electron.js && rm -rf preload.js && echo && echo 'unelectron: electron.js artifacts deleted' && echo
scripts.uninstall: rm -rf yarn.lock && rm -rf node_modules && echo && echo 'uninstall: node modules and yarn lockfiles deleted' && echo
scripts.clean: run-s -l unbinaries uncache undist unelectron unerror && echo && echo 'clean: all artifacts deleted' && echo
scripts.purge: run-s -l unbinaries uncache undist unelectron unerror uninstall && echo && echo 'purge: all modules and artifacts deleted' && echo
scripts.tsc-build: tsc public/electron.ts && echo && echo 'tsc-build: transpiled public/electron.js'
scripts.tsc-dev: cp public/preload.js . && tsc public/electron.ts -w --outDir . && echo && echo 'tsc-dev: watching and transpiling electron.js'
scripts.reinstall: yarn purge && yarn && echo && echo 'reinstall: rebuilt node_modules && echo'
scripts.electron-dev: sleep 15 && wait-on http://localhost:3000 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.develop: cross-env NODE_ENV=development run-p -l tsc-dev react-dev electron-dev
scripts.react-test: react-scripts test --env=jsdom && echo && echo 'react-test: testing complete' && echo
scripts.react-eject: echo 'WARNING: THIS PROCESS CANNOT BE REVERSED - GIT COMMIT FIRST SO YOU CAN ROLL BACK' && echo && echo 'if you really hate create-react-app this much, manually run:' && echo && echo '                                                             react-scripts eject' && echo && echo
scripts.react-build: react-scripts build && echo && echo 'react-build: built artifacts in build/' && echo
scripts.macos-warning: echo && echo 'macos-warning: This npm script will only function on macos' && echo
scripts.not-macos-warning: echo && echo 'not-macos-warning: This npm script will not function on macos except in docker' && echo
scripts.cr-build-lmw: yarn macos-warning && yarn cr-build -lm && yarn cr-build-w-docker
scripts.postdist-all: run-p -l move-l move-m move-w && say 'All distributables output to binaries directory.'
scripts.dist-l: run-s -l unelectron build-transpile cr-build-l && echo && echo 'dist-l: built linux .AppImage' && echo
scripts.move-l: mv dist/*.AppImage binaries/ && echo && echo 'move-l: moved linux .AppImage to binaries/' && echo
scripts.dist-m: run-s -l unelectron build-transpile cr-build-m && echo && echo 'dist-m: built mac .dmg' && echo
scripts.move-m: mv dist/*.dmg binaries/ && echo && echo 'move-m: moved mac .dmg to binaries/' && echo
scripts.dist-w: run-s -l unelectron build-transpile cr-build-w && echo && echo 'dist-w: built windows .exe' && echo
scripts.move-w: mv dist/*.exe binaries/ && echo && echo 'move-w: moved windows .exe to binaries/' && echo
scripts.cr-build-w-docker: docker run --rm --env ELECTRON_CACHE='/root/.cache/electron' --env ELECTRON_BUILDER_CACHE='/root/.cache/electron-builder' -v ${PWD}:/project -v ${PWD}/cache/electron:/root/.cache/electron -v ${PWD}/cache/electron-builder:/root/.cache/electron-builder electronuserland/builder:wine-mono yarn cr-build-w
scripts.precr-build-w-docker: rm -rf cache && mkdir cache && mkdir cache/electron && mkdir cache/electron-builder
scripts.dist-w-docker: run-s -l build-transpile cr-build-w-docker && echo && echo 'dist-docker: built windows .exe' && echo
scripts.predist-w-docker: echo && echo 'did you want to run yarn undocker first?' && echo
